message.body: Should u/do u want to see ur internist & dentist here during that wk ur home? BS isn't fond of paying out of state & out of plan providers for anything in-plan providers can do.
Can u also try to plan to come to Ocdi the thurs aft u r home at 3:30, pls? Our SW Thea & I would live to include u in a session. Dad has come to the others.
Oppty 4 u 2 plan ahead 2c ur colleagues there b4 or after. And if u haven't seen the lobby outside Pierce Hall in the Admin bldg, I insist u c it!
It is haverfest I have received these and will respond to them later ok? I love you!
I have seen it! We had orientation there. May 30th is more likely than the 23rd for going to the OCDI. Ideally I should see pcp and dentist but I have no appointments...
U should absolutely call internist mon am, say u just got the Philly, & beg. I don't wish symptoms on u, but a complaint or 2 will likely get u in faster. Dad sez dental not covered anyway.
Oh yeah, now u can just send ur teeth to Becca!!
U should find out whether u have employee/staff/community/Quad-Co Alumna access to the UPenn infirmary/clinic/hospital services in some way, esp if at $0 or at least reduced $$.
Doing ERPs here at home now. You talkable tomw eve?
I get benefits so I'm not sure what those are or what the insurance includes. Probably...don't know when/if I'm meeting w my thesis group to work on our presentation.
Let us know. Hope to go to cam tomw. Cam closes at 6. Curfew (gasp--??curfew???) is at 10 sun-Th, and at 11p Fri Sat.
